course_title: Field Course: Systems Approaches to Regional Sustainability

201.comments: ISCI 361 is a field course held in Hawaii during reading week. Students are registered by Integrated Sciences. For more info e-mail intsci@science.ubc.ca

description: Systems science approaches encompassing geological, hydrological, ecological, atmospheric sciences, and energy systems to investigate a selected region of the world.  Course location will vary; fee payable prior to field course.
